sentence.Network_en: He vociferously opposed the state of emergency imposed by the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 他激烈反对政府强行宣布进入紧急状态。

sentence.Network_en: They are arguing vociferously over who should pay the bill.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们为谁该付账单大声争吵.

sentence.Network_en: Annixter had cursed him so vociferously and tersely that even Osterman was cowed.
sentence.Network_cn: 安尼克斯特骂了他的声音之大,语气之凶,连奥斯特曼也不禁吓了一跳.

entry.def: If you describe someone as vociferous, you mean that they speak with great energy and determination, because they want their views to be heard.

example.ex: He was a vociferous opponent of Conservatism...
His resentment of her behaviour was becoming more vociferous.
example.tran: 他越来越大声地表达对她行为的厌恶。
